title: 51 Getting to Know Jim Berman, Host of Foodable's Newest Podcast: Chef AF
description: In this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron sits down with Chef Jim Berman, a longtime Foodable Expert Contributor currently working as a corporate chef. Berman is the host of Foodable’s newest podcast show—Chef AF, It’s All Food!
itunes:author: Foodable Network
